title: Event Schedule Update
content: The welcome speech has been moved 30 minutes earlier. Please plan accordingly.

title: Parking Information
content: Complimentary parking is available at the venue. Please show your ticket at the entrance.

title: Dress Code Reminder
content: The event has a semi-formal dress code. We look forward to seeing you in your best attire!

title: Guest Speaker Announced
content: We are excited to welcome Dr. Ayesha Khan as the keynote speaker for the closing session.

title: Workshop Registrations Closing Soon
content: Registrations for hands-on workshops will close on June 6. Reserve your spot soon!

title: Weather Advisory
content: Expect light showers on the day of the event. Carry umbrellas or raincoats if needed.

title: Photography Notice
content: Professional photographers will be covering the event. Contact organizers for copies.

title: Check-In Instructions
content: Please bring your QR badge and a valid ID for smooth check-in at the reception desk.

title: Lunch Menu Preview
content: Explore the curated multi-cuisine lunch buffet available during the event.

title: Networking Session Details
content: Join us for a casual networking session post-event with refreshments and music.
